overview: A young geek (Nick Spears) is spending his time on the deep web and discovers a website which hides a trapped ghost. The strange beaing (William Wayne) will haunt him and abuse of his body. Disturbed by this experience, Nick became madly in love, and call a Guru Light (Iago Torres), an expert in the paranormal activities, to help free the ghost. But one must convince the man who imprisoned the ghost, which is the ex jealous boyfriend (Will Wood). A session of black magic and wild sex shall bring back the Ghost in the real world. Find out how the power of true love breaks the spell!
title: Ghost Fucker
